settings.title: Size Guide
settings.copy: At FELLA, we understand that all bodies are unique. Click below to see our fit guide and recommendations so you can find your perfect FELLA

settings.size_guide_des:
*Please contact customercare@fellaswim.com for further sizing advice.
The size recommended is dependant on the style of the top.

If your recommended size has an asterisk (*), please contact customercare@fellaswim.com for further sizing advice. The size recommended is dependant on the style of the top.

*Please contact customercare@fellaswim.com for further sizing advice.
The size recommended is dependant on the style of the top.

If your recommended size has an asterisk (*), please contact customercare@fellaswim.com for further sizing advice. The size recommended is dependant on the style of the top.

For the waist, measure around the natural waistline.
For the hips, measure around the widest part of the hip bones making sure the tape measure is horizontal to the ground all the way around the body.
settings.size_guide_des_m:
For the waist, measure around the natural waistline.

For the hips, measure around the widest part of the hip bones making sure the tape measure is horizontal to the ground all the way around the body.

settings.size_guide_des: For the bust, measure around the fullest part of the bust making sure the tape measure is horizontal to the ground, around the body. For the waist, measure around the natural waist line. For hips, measure around the widest part of the hip bones making sure the tape measure is horizontal to the ground, around the body. This is a general guide, if you are unsure of your sizing please contact customercare@fellaswim.com for assistance.
settings.size_guide_des_m:
For the bust, measure around the fullest part of the bust making sure the tape measure is horizontal to the ground, around the body.

For the waist, measure around the natural waist line.

For hips, measure around the widest part of the hip bones making sure the tape measure is horizontal to the ground, around the body.

This is a general guide, if you are unsure of your sizing please contact customercare@fellaswim.com for assistance.
